relics.name: Blade Mail
relics.description: Gain 2 theaxe:Spin at the start of combat.
relics.flavorText: A razor-sharp coat of mail, it is the choice of selfless martyrs in combat. Or skilled show-offs.

relics.name: Cloak Of Flames
relics.description: When you are attacked, apply 1 theaxe:Bloodlust to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: A very fine cloak that plays host to an overly-protective living flame.

relics.name: Aegis Of The Immortal
relics.description: The first time you would die each combat, heal 4 HP instead.
relics.flavorText: The Immortal was said to own a shield that protected him from death itself.

relics.name: Vanguard
relics.description: Gain 2 theaxe:Malleable at the start of combat.
relics.flavorText: A powerful shield that defends its wielder from even the most vicious of attacks.

relics.name: Heaven's Halberd
relics.description: Every 5 turns, prevent the next time you would lose HP.
relics.flavorText: This halberd moves with the speed of a smaller weapon, allowing the bearer to win duels that a heavy edge would not.

relics.name: Trickster Cloak
relics.description: At the start of combat, choose 1 of 2 theaxe:Item cards to add to your hand.
relics.flavorText: A fantastic garment immediately misplaced by its creator upon completion.

relics.name: Goodkind's Prestige
relics.description: Gain theaxe:Spin at the start of combat.
relics.flavorText: Axe's reputation precedes him, thanks to his Bard companion.

relics.name: Divine Rapier
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. Start combats with 3 Unplayable Retaining Curses added to your opening hand.
relics.flavorText: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.

relics.name: Giant's Ring
relics.description: Draw 1 additional card and add a Dazed to your hand each turn.
relics.flavorText: Prized procurement of an otherwise unremarkable ruler of Elze who abdicated his position and vanished.

relics.name: Heart of Tarrasque
relics.description: Replaces Blade Mail. Start each combat with 5 theaxe:Metallicize and 3 Regen.
relics.flavorText: Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.

relics.name: Bloodstone
relics.description: theaxe:Bloodlust no longer decrements when enemies damage you.
relics.flavorText: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.

keywords.name: Multiword Keyword
keywords.description: Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest should use _ to replace spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.

keywords.name: Plated Armor
keywords.description: At the end of your turn, gain Block. Receiving unblocked attack damage reduces Plated Armor by 1.

keywords.name: This is displayed in the tooltip.
keywords.description: This is displayed in the tooltip. Note, spaces are not allowed in NAMES. For multi-word keywords, see the next one.

keywords.name: Bloodlust
keywords.description: Bloodlusted creatures lose HP at the start of their turn. Bloodlust is reduced by a third when the creature deals unblocked damage.

keywords.name: Blur
keywords.description: Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.

keywords.name: Buffer
keywords.description: The next time you lose HP, reduce the HP loss to 0.

keywords.name: Item
keywords.description: Items are Unplayable cards with Retain that have a passive effect in the hand and provide another effect on xhaust.

keywords.name: Malleable
keywords.description: Upon receiving attack damage, gain Block. Block gain increases by 1 each time Malleable is triggered. Resets at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Metallicize
keywords.description: Gain Block at the end of your turn.

keywords.name: Refresh
keywords.description: Add a copy of this card to your hand next turn.

keywords.name: Slow
keywords.description: Whenever you play a card, the enemy receives 10% more damage from attacks this turn.

keywords.name: Spin
keywords.description: When receiving Attack damage, deal damage equal to Spin to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Vigor
keywords.description: Your next attack deals extra damage.

mods.name: The Axe
mods.description:
Adds Axe from Dota 2 as a playable character.
- Features 75 new cards with unique art, including custom-made art and art from Dota.

- Accumulate Spin to retaliate against groups of enemies.
- Stack Bloodlust on the enemy to wear them down until they damage you.
- Collect Item cards, which provide passive benefit in the hand.

Credits:
- Mod designed and programmed by Axelrod777. Discord: Axelrod#5084.
- Featuring character and card art by jdeg.jpg on Instagram. Discord: JDegs#9781.
- Featuring other art by Jangirl#3025 on Discord.
- Credit to Jalcober, propen, and burga boy for some Steam Workshop art.
- Special thanks to the Slay The Spire Discord's modding channel for all their help.
- Axe, Dota, Artifact, and Underlords belong to Valve Corporation.

Coming soon: More potions, more custom art, and balance updates.
Playtesting build. Not intended for public release.
Send balance and feature suggestions to Axelrod#5084 on Discord.
